name: Editar exitosamente nuevo curso

exception.message: Expected enabled element was not enabled

rootCause.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for By.xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Java')] to be enabled (tried for 5 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)
